alert.note: Alert for Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 12:18AM CDT until June 14 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL GARLAND...WESTERN SALINE AND NORTHERN HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 1217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hot Springs National Park, or near Hot Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Mountain Pine... Lonsdale... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Oaklawn Racetrack... Nance... Mountain Valley... Gulpha Gorge... Crows... Owensville... Reform... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
